name: Affirmed
description: The 1978 Kentucky Derby was the 104th running of the Kentucky Derby. Affirmed, under jockey Steve Cauthen, won the race by 1 1/2 lengths over Alydar. Believe It finished 3rd, 1 1/4 lengths behind Alydar, and 30-1 longshot Darby Creek Road finished 4th. In 1978, Affirmed became the 11th winner of the Triple Crown of American horse racingâ€”the Kentucky Derby, the Preakness Stakes, and the Belmont Stakes.
